Fortify network objects.

Source: R/ggnetwork.R
ggnetwork.Rd

A wrapper for the fortify.network and fortify.igraph functions that will also try to coerce matrices and data frames to network objects.

ggnetwork(x, ...)

Arguments

x

an object of class network, or any object that can be coerced to this class, such as an adjacency or incidence matrix, or an edge list: see edgeset.constructors and network for details. If the object is of class igraph and the intergraph package is installed, it will be used to convert the object: see fortify.igraph for details.
...

arguments passed to the fortify.network function.

Contents

  • Arguments
